rule.name: CASE_APP_UpdateProductQuantity
rule.description: Used to generate a structured CDT of Product that iterates the quantity
rule.definition: with( local!product: #"_a-0000d9df-3187-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_9451"( ri!productSKU ), 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:CASE_APP}CASE_APP_Product'( id: local!product.id, name: local!product.name, sku: local!product.sku, description: local!product.description, category: local!product.category, manufacturer: local!product.manufacturer, modelNumber: local!product.modelNumber, releaseDate: local!product.releaseDate, isActive: local!product.isActive, price: local!product.price, quantity: local!product.quantity + ri!restockCount, shippingDetails: local!product.shippingDetails, productImageDocId: local!product.productImageDocId, webImageID: local!product.webImageID, productCategory: local!product.productCategory, barcodeDocId: local!product.barcodeDocId, createdBy: local!product.createdBy, createdOn: local!product.createdOn, updatedOn: local!product.updatedOn, updatedBy: local!product.updatedBy ) )
